name: Apex Destiny (Demo - only chapter 1 of 20) (Eazi Belldonis)
name_original: Apex Destiny (Demo - only chapter 1 of 20) (Eazi Belldonis)
description:
Apex Destiny, tells the story of heroes and villains, scattered across space and time.  Join Eon, and his fellowship of brave strong warriors.  As they oppose the tyrannical forces of Pendulum, a corporation bent on dominating the world.  When the world is coming to an end,  what is the best choice to save it with the least collateral damage?  A line in the sand will be drawn, what will you decided, to forge the Apex Destiny?

Apex Destiny (Demo), offers over 8 hours of non-stop story and gameplay.    With future additional content on the way.
